name: The Strange Floating Eye That Sometimes Comes Into Your Room In The Human Sanctuary And Messes With Your Stuff
name_original: The Strange Floating Eye That Sometimes Comes Into Your Room In The Human Sanctuary And Messes With Your Stuff
description:
A one-room game for the Bitsy One-Room game jam.

It's about the strange floating eye that sometimes comes into your room in the Human Sanctuary and messes with your stuff.
